text: Ra tiniharumadhye kehi yasta chan jo tapa'iko kura sunne svana parchan ra hamile tiniharuka hrdayamathi avarana halidi'eka chaum, jasale ki tinala'i bujhna nasakun ra unako kanaharuma bahiropanako srjana garidi'eka chaum ra yadi tiniharule sampurna nisaniharu dekhe tapani, tinamathi kahile imana lya'une chainan, yahamsam'ma ki jaba tiniharu tapa'iko najika a'umchan ta bina karana vivada garna a'umchan ta jo kaphira chan, yasari bhandachan ki yo (kura'ana) ta purvajaharuko danta katha baheka aru kehi ho'ina
